title: How about, when you download league for the first time, you actually download the new client
body: Because I got a new PC I had to re download league, but it downloads the old client so you have to update to the new client, then you have to update the actual game so all in all it takes about 2 hours, I don't see how this would make new players want to play the game when such a daunting download is in the way of their first game. Idk maybe i'm downloading the client from the wrong place but can you make it so that when you click Play the Game from Leagueoflegends.com you actually download the new client right from the launcher, and not have to go through all that extra downloading and hassle? Idk maybe its just me{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
